content:
<@360491619402776577> sorry to bother, was trying to upgrade some internal tooling with your tx-fuzzer v1.4.0, wondering how to properly call txfuzz.CreateAccessList(rpc, tx, sender)
i think i tried all the supported transaction types and still keep getting  both gasPrice and (maxFeePerGas or maxPriorityFeePerGas) specified. which transaction type should I be using to properly use the function above
